original_text: But the army of the Chaldeans pursued the king and overtook him in the plains of Jericho, and all his army was scattered from him.
korean_text: 갈대아 군대가 그 왕을 뒤쫓아가서 여리고 평지에서 그를 따라 잡으매 왕의 모든 군대가 그를 떠나 흩어진지라

sentences.original_text: But the army of the Chaldeans pursued the king
and overtook him in the plains of Jericho
and all his army was scattered from him.
